section.heading: Restrictions on purchases of fossil fuel-burning vehicles and systems by District government.

para.text: Beginning January 1, 2025, the District government shall not install, in District-owned buildings, space- or water-heating systems that rely on the combustion of natural gas, oil, or other fossil fuels at the site of the system, except in cases where compliance with this paragraph would be technically infeasible.

This subsection shall not apply to the replacement of components of existing space- or water-heating appliances that rely on the combustion of natural gas, oil, or other fossil fuels at the site of the system.
Beginning January 1, 2026, the District government shall purchase or lease only zero-emissions vehicles, except in cases where there is no such vehicle readily available on the market.
